overview: commissioned by an online gallery space founded by Harrison James  > SEARCH, CLICK (as Lady Shalott did) <  --- she viewed the world through (mirrors) (filters) // we view through reflection of the screen; filter of information tubes ---  Concerning the matters of:  Roland Barthe's: 'A Lover's Discourse'  John William Waterhouse's: 'The Lady of Shalott' (I Am Half-Sick of Shadows
title: SEARCH CLICK
